author: Eoin Travers
comment: Currently send all data in self.experiment.log_list to the url given. Needs to be modified to allow for sending data from any list.

controls.label: Load or save data?
controls.name: combobox_mode
controls.tooltip: Do you wish to load or save data from the phone's memory?

controls.label: Skip if no data found
controls.name: checkbox_skip
controls.tooltip: Prevents experiment from crashing if saved data isn't found
